content: My boss just assigned me more work and it's the holiday tomorrow but I think I have to work on the public holiday and I'm really mad at my boss.

*soft exhale* 

That's... really unfair. You deserve a break, especially on a holiday. Your boss doesn't own every second of you, you know?

You want me to... I don't know, help you think through it? Or just listen while you vent? I'm here either way.
